Package utilities

Class DBCustomers

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.DBCustomers
  • public class DBCustomers
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for holding SQL statements as they pertain to Customers and add/update/delete Customer.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customers> getAllCustomers()
        SQL statement execution for turning MySQL table into Observable Array List
        Returns:
        an Observable array list of all customers.

      • addCustomer

        public static void addCustomer​(java.lang.String customerName,
                               java.lang.String customerAddress,
                               java.lang.String customerPostalCode,
                               java.lang.String customerPhoneNumber,
                               int divisionId,
                               int countryId)
        SQL Statement executor for adding a Customer.
        Parameters:
        customerName - Name of customer to add.
        customerAddress - Address of customer to add.
        customerPostalCode - Postal Code of customer to add.
        customerPhoneNumber - Phone number of customer to add.
        divisionId - Division customer resides in.
        countryId - Country customer resides in.

      • updateCustomer

        public static void updateCustomer​(int customerId,
                                  java.lang.String customerName,
                                  java.lang.String customerAddress,
                                  java.lang.String customerPostalCode,
                                  java.lang.String customerPhoneNumber,
                                  int divisionId)
        SQL Statement executor for updating a customer
        Parameters:
        customerId - ID of customer being updated (non editable)
        customerName - Name of customer being updated.
        customerAddress - Address of customer being updated.
        customerPostalCode - Postal Code of customer being updated.
        customerPhoneNumber - Phone number of customer being updated.
        divisionId - Division of customer being updated.

      • getAllCountries

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Countries> getAllCountries()
        SQL Statement executor to make an Observable Array list of all relevant countries. Please note more countries can be added as needed.
        Returns:
        A list of all countries we do business with.

      • getAllDivisions

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivisions> getAllDivisions​(int countId)
        SQL Statement executor to get all divisions within a chosen country.
        Parameters:
        countId - Indicates which country the divisions will be in.
        Returns:
        A list of all the divisions within one country.

      • deleteCustomer

        public static boolean deleteCustomer​(int customerId)
        SQL Statement executor to delete a customer using the customer ID.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Customer ID of the customer you wish to Delete.
        Returns:
        Boolean of true if deleted and false if not.
